def _updateValue(self, event):
        mouseX = self._widget.canvasx(
            event.x_root - self._widget.winfo_rootx())
        if mouseX < self.left:
            mouseX = self.left
        if mouseX > self.right:
            mouseX = self.right
        # Update value
        sf = (mouseX - self.left)/(self.right - self.left)
        newVal = sf * (self['max'] - self['min']) + self['min']
        self.set(newVal)
